item.title: [paying] help [paying]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It is PI.

Put this in ItemDef.java inside the client files

case 20010: itemDef.modelid = 13701; itemDef.name = "dragon kite shield"; itemDef.description = "The kite shield of the all mighty deadly."; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; itemDef.modelRotationY = 458; itemDef.modelRotationX = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.anInt165 = 13700; itemDef.anInt200 = 13701; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [paying] help [paying]
item.dc:creator: @creaper1030 creaper1030
item.description:
@creaper1030 wrote:

[code]ok so i got a dkite in my 562 and it goes to weapons spot instead of shield :S help ill give u code or ints i put.

[codecase 20010:
itemDef.modelid = 13701;
itemDef.name = “dragon kite shield”;
itemDef.description = “The kite shield of the all mighty deadly.”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 458;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = 13700;
itemDef.anInt200 = 13701;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;][/code]

HELP i will pay either rs cash. rs membership codes…or you can be nice and not charge but seriously. HELP!

Read full topic
